title: Soho China Founder: Invested in US to Diversify from China
description: Zhang Xin, founder and CEO of Closer Properties and former CEO of SOHO China, where she remains an executive director, discusses opportunities in U.S. real estate and building luxury Manhattan condos with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
